website_summaries.verdict: A well-made rack from renewable bamboo. Money-back guarantee helps make this a great value for a quality shoe rack.
pros: Clean design is also easy to assemble with no tools required
Quality and look of the bamboo is impressive
cons: With very large men's shoes or boots (over size 11) it is difficult to fit more than two pairs of shoes on each rack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe rack made from sustainable bamboo!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe rack comes flat-packed, but is very easy to assemble in fewer than 10 minutes. The bamboo design is beautiful and to me, more importantly, sustainable. My biggest desire is that the stands were slightly wider.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M

customer_reviews.title: Quality is exceptional.
customer_reviews.text: Can't get over the quality of this wood. This looks like something you'd buy at West Elm for $129. So easy to put together and easy to put in a closet, though looks very nice as a stand alone piece of furniture. Would love to buy some more pieces with this same bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Carter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to set up side by side in my entry hall, and I am very pleased! They were easy to assemble and are exactly as I expected them to be based on photos and reviews here. They seem to be sturdy and look very nice for the price - hopefully they can last me awhile and hold under the weight of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Otte

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack is extremely easy to assemble and holds 12 pair of shoes. It’s very lightweight so I put my heavier shoes on the bottom but I would definitely order again if I had the space for another one! I have a very small closet but a very big love for shoes and this has helped tremendously with saving space. My sister saw it and is getting one herself
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: great item for the money
customer_reviews.text: i liked how easy it was to put together and also how well it was made too.
customer_reviews.author: linda longo

customer_reviews.title: Strong and well polished rack
customer_reviews.text: I got this rack to arrange my decoration items and books in my living area. Bamboo is creating a organic feel in the home. The bamboo is well polished. It is stronger than i expected. Clear instructions is provided along with the product marking which made me to assemble easily.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood. Thin. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Great for shoes or use it in your kitchen for dishes or vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Malki Zee

customer_reviews.title: Really cute bamboo shoe stand
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of it. It was super easy to assemble and stores a lot of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly snc super stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love the product !! I am not super practical when it comes to assembling stuff .. but the STNDRD rack is super easy to assemble . I love how neat it looks and it is super sturdy!! I will order another one to have all my shoes in check ! The main reason why I buy bamboo furniture Is cause it is eco friendly : bamboo is one of renewable resources in the planet ! Can’t go wrong when something is eco friendly and looks great !!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Romani

customer_reviews.title: Assembles in 20-30 min, looks good, feels light but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: One of the screws were a bit warped where the Allen wrench was supposed to lock in, but otherwise it assembled fine, looks great and is super light.
customer_reviews.author: Arnez

customer_reviews.title: Actual size
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars because the actual size cannot fit three pair of men's shoes I wear size 10 and a half and I have to put one facing the opposite way and one facing Other Direction shoes.boots only two pairs
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and well made. I didn't check the dimensions so I was surprised a little that for the price it was a little smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: TailGunner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product & so sturdy! This truly looks amazing in any room!
customer_reviews.author: Aly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe rack! I loved the smaller size available for our RV and when my husband was putting it together he commented on the impressive quality, which is unusual for him! Fit perfectly and it quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: T. Besendorfer

customer_reviews.title: Really attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and a really nice small piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product! Holds up to three pairs of shoes in each row
customer_reviews.author: Donnaps

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Helps me be organized with all my shoes. Shoes fit perfectly on the shelf High quality wood. Easy to assemble,tools included.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe rack. Love it. I will reorder another for my dress shoes! Sturdy and quality looking!
customer_reviews.author: Reshone Dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful little shelf. It's nicely built and just right. Great value and looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A Feffer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: This rack is too small to fit 3 pairs of size 9 men’s shoes on each shelf. Is it was just an inch wider it would work great.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and at a size and color that fits most decor. We’re used it in our kitchen for dairy use and quick storage of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Carroll Shepherd, III

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. Would not be good for boots...will use it in storage instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Nice, attractive shoe rack that holds two pair of adult shoes on each level. Plan to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: A practical piece to store your shoes. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: nechoma Junik

customer_reviews.title: High quality and presentable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and very nicely packaged. Easy to put together and very sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: Good small shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: Its good value for the size, but too small Between shelves for any shoe taller than a loader or flat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this company and there great customer service and integrity. Very strong and well put together shoe rack. Great material and classy/causul look and sturdy. 5star
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I ordered. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, made out of quality material. Fits at least 3 pairs of shoes on each level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: The rack is to small. this is a rack for children not adults
customer_reviews.author: Sierra H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This product was super easy to assemble and was exactly what I was expecting. Great for small spaces and I love that it's made with sustainable materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdier than my metal one I bought at Walmart. Love it! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: I like the shelf itself
customer_reviews.text: I like the shelf itself. It was easy to assemble and fits a lot of shoes. My only complaint is the packaging. The fist claim on the product description is that it is eco-friendly and while, yes, bamboo is very environmentally friendly, the packaging was not. It came in a HUGE box and inside that was the actual product which was wrapped in bubble wrap and enclosed in styrofoam both of which cannot be recycled and are terrible for the environment. There are many other eco-friendly packaging options and if they were used I would've given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and perfect sized shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy, and perfect sized shoe rack! Buy with confidence, you will be satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I should have double checked the dimensions because this was not the size I was hoping for. However it is a nice and stable shelf. Wish I had a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is stable
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is stable. Holds a lot of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a great shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: this is a great shoe rack! assembly was extremely easy and straightforward. the distance between each shelf is perfect. I also like that it hold a lot of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order for this shelf. We love the first one so my wife demanded she get one too! We had a minor "burp" with delivery of the first one. Not sure if it was Amazon or the vendor, BUT the Vendor was very quick to communicate and (I think) made contact with Amazon to resolve the problem! That was very cool! This is a good product for the money! Very sturdy, easy to assemble and nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe Rack, but Photo is Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice enough shoe rack, and was quite easy to assemble; however, the photo is deceiving. This may hold three pairs of woman's or child's shoes per tier, but it will only accommodate two pairs of men's shoes per tier (I wear size 12.)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Early

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight product just way overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an OK product. Definitely like that it’s lightweight. Also seems pretty durable build overall. However, I definitely wouldn’t pay $50 for it. I’d say $30 max.

customer_reviews.title: 3 Pairs of Sz6 Shoes won't fit
customer_reviews.text: I did see the review that 3 pairs of sz9 shoes won't fit So I think 1 pair of sz9 and 2 pairs of sz6 would be okay. I was too naive. Instead, I tried 3 pairs of sz6, hoping it would work. I am day dreaming. Well Not a good enough shopping experience to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Huarui414

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy shoe rack. I wanted to get the shoes scattered at the garage door organized and this was just the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: fyrefiter

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and useful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and sturdy enough. Nice organizer So good I purchased a second one. Really like it
customer_reviews.author: Bman

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for intended use
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, was easy enough to put together, and looks great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Connor

customer_reviews.title: nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: looks good, sturdy, easy assembly. it's holding both shoes and some hand weights (10-lb and under)
customer_reviews.author: DMTCR

customer_reviews.title: I added baskets to hold more shoes and random items (shoe cleaning supplies) - looks sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute addition, I added baskets to hold more shoes and random items (shoe cleaning supplies) - looks sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalia Niznik

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Using as a towel rack with rolled towels! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: stef

product_meta.title: STNDRD. Bamboo Wood Shoe Rack Organizer (1-Pack)
feature_bullets: ECO FRIENDLY. The STNDRD. shoe rack is an environmentally friendly piece of furniture. Bamboo is one of the many renewable resources in the planet. It takes only 5 years to regrow a bamboo tree compared to other types of hardwood.

RUSTIC FURNITURE. This bamboo shoe rack furniture item is a versatile piece. It is built from bamboo wood strong enough to hold some indoor plants. The light colored bamboo pieces are manufactured without using any method to alter its natural rustic look.

PROVIDES COMPETITIVE PRICING ON FURNITURES. Our bamboo shoe rack comes at a competitive price compared to other wood furniture sets. Bamboo is a low cost raw material so it owns a big price advantage over other kinds of furniture sets.
READY TO ASSEMBLE FURNITURE. Our STNDRD. shoe rack comes in a flat package box containing 4 tiers bamboo. The assembly instructions are very easy to follow and no need for any special tools to use.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We are so confident with our product that we will give you a no-questions asked money back guarantee. So hit that "Add to Cart" button now get this versatile bamboo shoerack for that refreshing rustic furniture design.
